content: in this legal case the court of pavia has made a final ruling regarding the division of an inheritance the court dissolved the community inheritance of three individuals ms ne ms nl and ms nf they determined the distribution of properties and valuables among the parties involved as well as the division of a fund the court considered relevant laws and regulations and assigned ownership of properties and valuables to the respective parties they also ordered the payment of certain amounts to other coheirs the court concluded that the costs of the litigation should be fully compensated by the parties the ruling was made on april 20 2020 by judge dr l in pavia
